description: This is a Flutter application main file (`main.dart`) that sets up the app's entry point, theme, and a simple home page with a loading indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that defines the MaterialApp, theme, and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class that builds the UI with an app bar and loading content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that starts the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for `MyApp` and `_MyHomePageState` widgets.
